title: Wordsmith 07 (1997) Caliber Comics Dave Darrigo & R.G. Taylo
description:
someone asked for this and all I had was issue issue no. 7 (as it was part of a flipper issue with "Nowheresville"). Since it was already scanned I though I should post it for those people who remember the series.

Meet Clay Washburn, who in the 1930s and 1940s, tries to make a living by cranking out fiction for the popular "pulp" magazines of the day and struggles with whatever life puts in his path. In addition to Clay's world, in each issue, you also often see the adventures of the fictional characters that he is working on

And before anyone asks...NO, i do not have the other issues, if while perusing comic shops I happen to come across them I might pick them up if the price is right.

Please seed and enjoy
